title: Enhancing Learning Design Practice Competencies: Collaborative Multimedia-Based Online Mathematics Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can convert mathematical concepts into visual and interactive multimedia materials for educational content.
Learners can complete a digital project solving math education problems through collaboration with peers using PBL (Problem-Based Learning).
Learners can manage the educational material production process by assuming roles as members of a multimedia development team in an online environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
